trans-unit.source: News record
Versatile news system.
Language of the news record.
Define a date on which the news record should be shown.
Define a date on which the news record should be hidden.
Select the user groups which are allowed to see the news record.
If checked, this news record can only be edited by administrators.
Hidden records are not shown in the frontend.
News title
Alternative Title will be used as the title for the browser window / tab
Be aware that it can be cropped.
Select the type which can be either a normal news record, a link to an internal page or a link to an external page.
Top news records can get a special treated concerning layout, sorting, ...
Author of the news record
Email address of the author
Date of the news record
Archive date. A date is required if the news record should once be treated as archived news.
Main content of the news record
Select the categories which are related to this record.
Define and select tags which fit to the article.
Content elements can be used to generate feature rich news articles.
Define keywords which can be used for SEO optimizations.
Define a description which can be used for SEO optimizations.
Select related news records.
Show news which select current news record as related.
Define related links to internal and external pages.
